Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.utility

Class Util

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.utility.Util
public class Util extends Object
Utility class providing common functionality for scene management, alerts, and JSON operations

  • Method Details

    • setHomePage

      public static void setHomePage(String pageName, String pageTitle)
      Sets the name and title of the home page.
      Parameters:
      pageName - the name of the home page
      pageTitle - the title of the home page

    • resetHome

      public static void resetHome()
      Resets the home page to an empty state.

    • switchToHome

      public static void switchToHome()
      Switches the view to the home page. If the home page is not set, it defaults to the login page.

    • switchScene

      public static FXMLLoader switchScene(String fxml, String title)
      Switches to a new scene
      Parameters:
      fxml - FXML file name of the new scene
      title - Title for the new scene
      Returns:
      FXMLLoader instance for the new scene, or null if switch failed

    • createAlert

      public static Alert createAlert(Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String msg)
      Creates and shows an alert dialog
      Parameters:
      alertType - Type of alert (ERROR, WARNING, INFORMATION, etc.)
      title - Title of the alert dialog
      msg - Message to display in the alert
      Returns:
      The created Alert object

    • readJsonArray

      public static org.json.JSONArray readJsonArray(String path) throws IOException
      Reads a JSON array from a file
      Parameters:
      path - Path to the JSON file
      Returns:
      JSONArray containing the file contents
      Throws:
      IOException - If file reading fails

    • writeJsonArray

      public static void writeJsonArray(String path, org.json.JSONArray jsonArray) throws IOException
      Writes a JSON array to a file
      Parameters:
      path - Path to the output file
      jsonArray - JSONArray to write
      Throws:
      IOException - If file writing fails
